articles.description: The company announced a feature that will algorithmically highlight viral content, not based on how big a user’s follower count is, with a daily $1 million payout. But can a reimagined, algorithmic way to reward viral content take users away from TikTok?
articles.content:
Can a reimagined, algorithmic way to reward viral content take users away from TikTok?
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Today, lets talk about the deceptively bold way in which Snapchat has … [+6128 chars]

articles.author: Adrian Diaconescu
articles.title: Samsung's first 2021 smartphones come with big batteries and low prices - PhoneArena
articles.description: The ultra-affordable Galaxy A02s and Galaxy A12 are Samsung's first 2021 smartphones already confirmed to be released in the next few months and fully detailed.

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Twitter is warning users when they attempt to 'like' misinformation - Sky News
articles.description: The company has introduced a new prompt challenging users when they like a labelled tweet to ask them to support "reliable info".
